definition: a description of somebody/something that gives useful information
the general impression that somebody/something gives to the public and the amount of attention they receive
the outline of a person’s face when you look from the side, not the front
the edge or outline of something that you see against a background
the amount of attention somebody/something has from the public
behaviour that controls or influences somebody/something, often in a dishonest way so that they do not realize it
the control or use of something in a way that shows skill
the skill or act of moving a person's bones or joints into the correct position
to walk with stiff regular steps like a soldier
to walk somewhere quickly in a determined way
to walk through the streets in a large group in order to protest about something
to force somebody to walk somewhere with you

to order somebody to leave a place, their job, etc.
to behave in a different way from other people; to have different attitudes or ideas
a virus that usually causes mild infections, but that can be serious for people with AIDS or for new babies

a friend of the couple at a wedding who helps show people to their seats
in ancient Greece, an open space used for markets and public meetings
having or using many small parts, such as microchips, that control and direct a small electric current
done or produced by means of a computer or other electronic device
involving or connected with electronic equipment
large waves in the sea or ocean, and the white foam that they produce as they fall on the beach, on rocks, etc.
an act of going surfing
a device that has resistance to an electric current in a circuit

to force somebody to leave a country

safe to drink

pleasant to drink

a line of light, electromagnetic waves or particles
a long piece of wood, metal, etc. used to support weight, especially as part of the roof in a building
a wooden bar that is used in the sport of gymnastics for people to move and balance on
a wide and happy smile
not correct; wrong
a special belt with a thick piece of material, worn by somebody who has a hernia in order to support the muscles
a frame made of pieces of wood or metal used to support a roof, bridge, etc.
a thin layer of wood or plastic that is stuck to the surface of cheaper wood with glue, especially on a piece of furniture
an outer appearance of a particular quality that hides the true nature of somebody/something
wanting to kill or wound; enjoying seeing or hearing about killing and violence
describing or showing killing and violence
involving or liking killing and blood
the natural colour and condition of the skin on a person’s face
the general character of something
to change the way that a situation appears
a statement, an event, etc. telling somebody that something bad or unpleasant may happen in the future so that they can try to avoid it
a statement telling somebody that they will be punished if they continue to behave in a particular way
a feeling of not being able to trust somebody/something

the fact of being given honour and respect by people

below what you see as your own importance or worth

including all, or almost all, the items, details, facts, information, etc., that may be involved

gained or lost by a large amount

with nobody or nothing in between
exactly in a particular position
immediately
soon

something that makes you feel uncomfortable or causes you a slight feeling of pain
the state of being annoyed, especially by something that somebody continuously does or by something that continuously happens
the fact of your skin or a part of your body being painful
a medical condition that causes severe loss of blood from even a slight injury because the blood fails to clot normally. It usually affects only men although it can be passed on by women.

used to introduce the last in a list of things

calm and relaxed; seeming not to worry about anything

an act of separating two things; the ending of a relationship between two things
connected with a town or city
connected with types of music such as rhythm and blues, reggae, soul, etc. that are played by black musicians

used to describe a traditional product, brand, type of animal or plant variety, especially one that is old-fashioned, rare and of high quality
the study of how people will live in the future
something that forms a connection between people or groups, such as a feeling of friendship or shared ideas and experiences

in the future, starting from now
